translations.source: 建设工程竣工验收报告
上海城投水务（集团）有限公司（章）
工程名称:泰和污水处理厂扩建工程THK1.1标(污水处理厂土建工程)
translations.target: Project Name: Taihe Wastewater Treatment Plant Expansion Project, Contract THK1.1 (Wastewater Treatment Plant Civil Works)

translations.source: 建设单位名称：上海城投水务（集团）有限公司
translations.target: Owner: Shanghai Chengtou Water (Group) Co., Ltd.
Issued by Shanghai Municipal Water Bureau

translations.source: 建设工程竣工验收报告
泰和污水处理厂扩建工程THK1.1标
translations.target: Taihe Wastewater Treatment Plant Expansion Project, Contract THK1.1

translations.source: 上海市宝山区蕴藻浜沿河绿带以北、联谊路以南区域
translations.target: Area north of the riverside greenbelt along Yunzaobang River and south of Lianyi Road, Baoshan District, Shanghai

translations.source: 一体化箱体桩基围护工程；一体化箱体构筑物：进水闸门井1座、中细格栅及曝气沉沙池1座、粗格栅及进水泵房1座、初沉池2座、生反池2座、二沉池2座、储泥池1座、中间提升泵房及高效沉淀池2座、反硝化深床滤池2座、紫外线消毒渠I座、加氯接触池1座、出水泵房及回用水泵房1座、放空泵房1座、鼓风机房1座、廊道；一体化箱体建筑物：综合用房1座、进水单元用房1座、深度处理用房1座、7#变电所及污泥装料车间1座、一体化箱体出入口1座、尾水单元用房1座；室外总体，包括厂区绿化、一期进水调控设施、一期尾水管改排等；地下联络通道。
translations.target: Pile foundation and enclosure works for the integrated box structure; Integrated box structure facilities: 1 influent gate shaft, 1 medium/fine screen and aerated grit chamber, 1 coarse screen and influent pump station, 2 primary sedimentation tanks, 2 biological reaction tanks, 2 secondary sedimentation tanks, 1 sludge storage tank, 1 intermediate lift pumping station and 2 high-efficiency sedimentation tanks, 2 denitrification deep-bed filters, 1 UV disinfection channel, 1 chlorination contact tank, 1 effluent pump station and reclaimed water pump station, 1 emptying pump house, 1 blower house, and galleries/corridors; Integrated box structure buildings: 1 comprehensive building, 1 influent unit building, 1 advanced treatment building, 1 No. 7 substation and sludge loading workshop, 1 integrated box structure entrance/exit, and 1 tailwater unit building; Outdoor works, including plant landscaping, Phase I influent regulation facilities, and modification and rerouting of the Phase I tailwater pipeline, etc.; underground connecting passageway.

translations.source: 上海市机械施工集团有限公司
translations.target: Shanghai Municipal Mechanical Construction Group Co., Ltd.
